title: Cucumber Orange Carrot Juice
directions: Peel orange and save a 1x1-inch piece of the peel. Place orange, orange peel piece, carrots, and cucumber in a blender; pour in water. Blend until desired consistency is reached; add sugar and lemon juice. Blend until smooth, 1 to 3 minutes.
ingredients: 1/4 cup white sugar, or to taste
